sections.title: TaskMaster: Building a Task Management App with SwiftData

inlineContent.text: Forget the complexity of Core Data. SwiftData is a next-generation
data persistence framework designed entirely for Swift developers.
Follow the 10-step growth ring curriculum to build
“TaskMaster,” a polished Todo app with iCloud sync support.
Understand what SwiftData is and how it differs from Core Data.
Discover why this framework introduced at WWDC23 is a game changer.
Define the TaskItem model with the @Model macro.
Explore the magic created by property wrappers and macros.
Understand the roles of ModelContainer and ModelContext and configure them in your app.
Experience seamless integration with the SwiftUI environment.
Implement real-time data binding with the @Query property wrapper.
Query data declaratively without writing NSFetchRequest.
Implement the four fundamental data operations: Create, Read, Update, Delete.
Learn ModelContext’s insert, delete, and auto-save mechanisms.
Set up a 1:N relationship between Task and Category.
Master the @Relationship macro and delete rules.
Implement type-safe filtering with the #Predicate macro.
Add sorting by priority and date with SortDescriptor.
Complete the entire UI including list views, detail views, and edit sheets.
Maximize the synergy between SwiftData and SwiftUI.
Safely handle data model changes during app updates.
Utilize VersionedSchema and SchemaMigrationPlan.
Sync tasks across all devices with iCloud integration.
Add cloud functionality with just a few lines of code.
